What's BitMart?

BitMart is a leading cryptocurrency exchange offering a range of trading services including spot trading and various financial products, all through a user-friendly and secure platform.

  • Spot and advanced trading
  • Competitive fees
  • Robust security measures
  • User-friendly experience

API Key Setup Process

Follow the steps below to create and configure your API keys for BitMart.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials.' %}

1 Create a BitMart Account

If you don’t already have a BitMart account, please sign up here.

2 Go to API Management

  1. Log in to your BitMart account.
  2. Click on your profile icon at the top-right corner and select API Management.

3 Create an API Key

  1. Click Create API.
  2. Enter a name for your API key (e.g., “My Trading Bot”).
  3. Set the necessery permissions (e.g., read, trade).

4 Set IP Whitelist and Confirm

  1. We strongly recommend setting an IP whitelist to increase security.
  2. Complete any security verification required (e.g., 2FA, email code).
  3. Once done, click Confirm to finalize.

Complete the Connection

Copy your API Key and Secret, then paste them into the integration form in your IsAlgo automate dashboard. Ensure you keep your credentials safe and never share them.
